instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Clean EFI dump for 820-00426 board
threads.message: Hi, I got 820-00426 board for repair with missing EFI chip and ripped all traces under it. I have tried two dumps I had, computer works on them but very slowly with fans running on max speed. I've tried cleaning ME Region, but it doesn't change anything. Can I ask you to share celan EFI for this board? The configuration from the board sticker is 2.5G MIC 16G MIC 2G. Thank you in avance!

threads.title: Clean EFI dump for 820-00426 board
threads.message:
Run HWMonitor and check for strange values.
Test it removing webcam cable.
Also test with known good trackpad flex/board.

threads.title: Clean EFI dump for 820-00426 board
threads.message: I have tried with unplugged webcam cable and new trackapd/flex - no changes. I takes around 30 seconds from the moment I press power button for the board to chime and show Apple logo. I have inspected the board for corrosion or other damages and haven't found anything except mentioned traces of EFI chip which I have already repaired. In the past I had similar behaviour cases of 820-00165 which turned out had bad EFI. Do you have celan EFI for this board? If yes, I would be thankful if you could share it.

threads.title: Clean EFI dump for 820-00426 board
threads.message:
Try this and comment.
[URL unfurl="true"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1I9DFTa8SjNCwq0YsdKmvaTT2lNtNmmmm/view?usp=sharing[/URL]
I don't remember where I got it from...

threads.title: Clean EFI dump for 820-00426 board
threads.message: EFI you posted is OK, it works perfectly now, thank you!

threads.title: Clean EFI dump for 820-00426 board
threads.message:
You're welcome!
Thanks for the confirmation, I will mark the bin as good.

threads.title: Clean EFI dump for 820-00426 board
threads.message: Is there any public thread or database on this forum where all EFI dumps are posted/ available for download? Or it’s all private?

threads.title: Clean EFI dump for 820-00426 board
threads.message:
Just use search engine.
Better to search with Google, adding "rossmanngroup" to the end.

threads.title: Clean EFI dump for 820-00426 board
threads.message:
I always start with that, just thought that I’m missing something and there is a thread with all working and confirmed dumps available for download somewhere on this forum. 

Thanks for your help [USER=682]@2informaticos[/USER]. If we would live somewhere close I’d give you a bottle of Scotch for all good job you do here ?
